description: Tonic Textual enables you to build and fine-tune LLMs on your free-text data while ensuring compliance and keeping sensitive information safe.
title: Tonic Textual | The Secure Data Lakehouse for LLMs | Tonic.ai
introduction: Welcome to our website! We offer a powerful AI Detector tool that helps businesses detect and analyze data efficiently. Our tool is designed to streamline data processing and provide valuable insights for decision-making. Whether you're a small business or a large enterprise, our AI Detector can help you optimize your operations and improve performance.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a free trial for new users to experience our AI Detector tool before committing to a subscription.

faqs.question: What kind of data can be analyzed with the AI Detector?
faqs.answer: Our AI Detector tool can analyze various types of data, including text, images, and numerical data.
